hero.title: Geoffroy Stanger
hero.subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about building modern web applications, developing SaaS products, and creating effective UX/UI experiences.

gojob.desc1: Worked on the whole candidate proposal flow, from the automated candidate proposal to the candidate profile page using Next.js, React, Tailwind, Nest.js, Typescript, Pub/Sub, and PostgreSQL.
gojob.desc2: Applied the principles of Clean Architecture, DDD, and TDD to ensure robust, modular, and testable code.

schaeffer.desc1: Focused on test automation and frontend development using Angular, Typescript, and Cypress.
schaeffer.desc2: Automated testing pipelines for enterprise new web applications.

fam.desc1: Was responsible for building an internal web application using Fastify, Typescript, PostgreSQL, and Vue.js, whose goal was to collect data from client requests.
fam.desc2: Designed REST APIs and contributed to application architecture and deployment with Docker.

kiwi2023.desc1: Contributed to the development of Windows desktop applications using Go.
kiwi2023.desc2: Implemented Microsoft Teams backup functionality using the Microsoft Graph API.

systancia.desc1: Built scripts to automate Linkedin data extraction with Phantombuster and Python.
systancia.desc2: Saved the extracted leads to a MSSQL database.

kiwi2021.desc1: Developed CLI tools for system administrators using Go to manage MongoDB databases.
kiwi2021.desc2: Implemented automation for routine tasks and improved system monitoring.

footer.text: © 2025 Geoffroy Stanger - Portfolio built with Nuxt & Tailwind

sarpbc.name: Sarpbc.org
sarpbc.description: A news and data website for Rocket League esports, built with Nuxt, TailwindCSS, and NestJS.

tissuco.name: Tissuco
tissuco.description: A SaaS platform that helps second-hand resellers manage their inventory and orders, built with Nuxt, Tailwind CSS, and NestJS.
